config.response_template: {     {% if body.ListedMerchants and #body.ListedMerchants > 0 then %}         "merchant":            {             "affiliationKey": "{{body['ListedMerchants'][1]['AffiliationKey']}}",             "companyName": "{{body['ListedMerchants'][1]['CompanyName']}}",             "creationDateTime": "{{body['ListedMerchants'][1]['CreationDate']}}",             "document": "{{body['ListedMerchants'][1]['DocumentNumber']}}",             "fantasyName": "{{body['ListedMerchants'][1]['TradeName']}}",             "id": {{body['ListedMerchants'][1]['Id']}},             {% if getmetatable(body['ListedMerchants'][1]['Mcc']) then %}             "mccId": {{body['ListedMerchants'][1]['Mcc']['Id']}},             "mccDescription": "{{body['ListedMerchants'][1]['Mcc']['Name']}}",             {% else %}             "mccId": null,             "mccName": null,             {% end %}             {% if getmetatable(body['ListedMerchants'][1]['SalesChannel']) then %}             "salesChannelId": {{body['ListedMerchants'][1]['SalesChannel']['Id']}},             "salesChannelName":"{{body['ListedMerchants'][1]['SalesChannel']['Name']}}"             {% else %}             "salesChannelId": null,             "salesChannelName": null,             {% end %}             {% if getmetatable(body['ListedMerchants'][1]['SalesTeamMember']) then %}             "salesTeamMemberName":"{{body['ListedMerchants'][1]['SalesTeamMember']['Name']}}",             {% else %}             "salesTeamMemberName": null,             {% end %}             {% if getmetatable(body['ListedMerchants'][1]['MerchantStatus']) then %}             "statusId": {{body['ListedMerchants'][1]['MerchantStatus']['Id']}},             "statusName": "{{body['ListedMerchants'][1]['MerchantStatus']['Name']}}",             {% else %}             "statusId": null,             "statusName": null             {% end %}            }             ,    {% end %}    "messages": {% if body.Message then %} ["{{body.Message}}"] {% else %} [] {% end %} }
